name: Bob and Blob
description:
Bob and Blob, two alien gravity defying extra-terrestrial creatures which are in fact, blobs, left stranded on an alien planet alone and separated. They must reach each other and join together overcoming all obstacles using their gravity switching powers in order to combine their strength to leave this planet and go back home. Controls of Bob and Blob are joined together.

 All art was created During the 48 hours of GameJam We used pre-existing audio for sound effects.

 In-game and menu music are original.

Controls:

Arrow Keys for movement.

Spacebar to change gravity.
